title: He khawvel hriat ngai loh muanna min pe la
lyrics:
He khawvel hriat ngai loh muanna min pe la,
Tuarna zara van muanna lo lang kha,
Ka thla thlipui nuai vela a lo awmin,
Isua hnenah Kraws-ah muanna a awm.

Thlipui hlauhawm berah pawh muanna tur chu,
Zan thim chhah lai manganthlak takah pawh,
Pa Pathian angchhung ka thla chau a chawlh nan,
Aw, thlamuanna tak tak chu min pe rawh.

Beidawnnaah pawh muang taka ka thawh nan,
Min neihtir rawh, thlamuanna tak tak chu;
Pathian hnena awmin thlipui eng ang pawh,
Hlau tawp lova him taka ka awm nan.

Aw, thlamuanna ber, luipui anga luangin,
Van khawpui tual, nunna thingkung sirah,
Van angel-te lunghnemtu muanna tak chu,
Kei ka tan pawh van lawmna kumkhua tur.
